Why don't u make the lidocaine from scratch? You'd use 2,6-dimethyaniline and mix with alpha-chloro-acetylchloride. This would make alpha-chloro-2 6-dimethylacetanilide which is then reacted with diethylamine to make lidocaine. The solution is toluene and you would use 2:1 ratio of diethylamine to the alpha-chloro-2 6-dimethylacetanilide to stop the formation of HCL, then you just need to extract and u get around 93% yield
